.tnt-slider{position:relative;z-index:99}.tnt-slider .tnt-slider-outer{overflow:hidden}.tnt-slider .tnt-slider-inner{float:left;white-space:nowrap;position:relative;overflow:hidden;transition:all .25s ease 0s}.tnt-slider .tnt-slider-inner.tnt-slider-resizing{transition:all 0s ease 0s}.tnt-slider .tnt-slider-item{position:relative;float:left;min-height:1px;white-space:normal}.tnt-slider-height{transition:height .5s ease-in-out}.tnt-slider .tnt-slider-controls{margin:0;position:absolute;top:50%;right:0;transform:translateY(-50%);-webkit-transform:translateY(-50%);-ms-transform:translateY(-50%);z-index:200}.slideshow-carousel-container .tnt-slider .tnt-slider-controls{top:0}.tnt-slider[data-slider-type=pagination] .tnt-slider-controls{padding:0;width:100%;position:relative;transform:translateY(0);-webkit-transform:translateY(0);-ms-transform:translateY(0)}.tnt-slider[data-slider-type=pagination] .tnt-slider-controls-bottom{margin-bottom:80px}.tnt-slider[data-slider-type=pagination] .tnt-slider-controls .tnt-slider-next,.tnt-slider[data-slider-type=pagination] .tnt-slider-controls .tnt-slider-previous{display:inline-block;padding:5px 14px;background-color:#fff;border:1px solid #ddd;color:#222;cursor:pointer;margin-bottom:20px}.tnt-slider[data-slider-type=pagination] .tnt-slider-controls .tnt-slider-next{float:right}.tnt-slider[data-slider-type=pagination] .tnt-slider-controls .tnt-slider-previous span{display:inline-block;float:right;padding:0 5px}.tnt-slider[data-slider-type=pagination] .tnt-slider-controls .tnt-slider-next span{display:inline-block;float:left;padding:0 5px}.tnt-slider[data-slider-type=pagination] .tnt-slider-counter{text-align:center}.tnt-slider[data-slider-type=pagination] .tnt-slider-counter p{margin-bottom:0}.photo-carousel .tnt-slider-controls .tnt-slider-next,.photo-carousel .tnt-slider-controls .tnt-slider-previous{color:rgba(0,0,0,.4);cursor:pointer;z-index:2;position:absolute;background-color:rgba(255,255,255,.9);padding:5px 10px;font-size:18px;user-select:none;opacity:.6;top:0}.photo-carousel .tnt-slider-controls .tnt-slider-next:hover,.photo-carousel .tnt-slider-controls .tnt-slider-previous:hover{color:rgba(0,0,0,.8);background-color:#fff}.photo-carousel .tnt-slider-controls .tnt-slider-previous{left:auto;right:40px;top:5px}.photo-carousel .tnt-slider-controls .tnt-slider-next{right:5px;top:5px}
